001package org.nasdanika.persistence;
002
003import java.util.List;
004
005import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
006import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
007
008/**
009 * Loads feature value using loader.
010 * @author Pavel
011 *
012 */
013public class Reference extends Attribute<Object> {
014
015        public Reference(Object key, boolean isDefault, boolean required, Object defaultValue, String description, Object... exclusiveWith) {
016                super(key, isDefault, required, defaultValue, description, exclusiveWith);
017        }
018        
019        @Override
020        public Object create(ObjectLoader loader, Object config, URI base, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor, List<? extends Marker> markers) {
021                return loader.load(config, base, progressMonitor);
022        }
023
024}
